divs: sighting detailsi did not see this when i was taking the pictures of tropical storm lees' clouds as they appeared approaching richmon.i was only taking several photos of some beautiful cloud formations at the rising of the sun.when i got to #87 photo i noticed a spec on the screen of my computer as i was down loading the pictures.it wasn't on the picture before or after.i was only out there in my front yard for a few seconds.when i zoomed in on this spec i was blown away as to what i saw.i saw a flying object high up in the cloud bank tilted over at about 45 degress.the object was red and has something like antennas coming out the top.the object has a concave bottom and has no wings.whatever it was didn't apparently make any noise as i was unaware of it as i took the photos.but,it must have really been going fast as to appear in only one of the digital frames.this was shot with a sony 14.1 mpx cyber shot camera.i still have the image saved in the memory card if any one wants to down load it on their computer.i don't know of anything in our world that flys and looks like this.i welcome questions or any assistance determining what this was or is. (name and number removed to field investigator box)cms 09\06\11 14:44 flg

Summary: A red bell shaped objest that is flared out at the bottom with something on top
